events.message: The customer reported a car accident that occurred yesterday involving their vehicle and a stationary object.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident following review of the initial report and damage description.
An insurance agent has been assigned to assist the claimant in processing the car accident claim efficiently.
The insurance company formally acknowledged receipt of the auto accident claim and initiated tracking.
The customer was asked to provide police reports, photos of the car damage, and witness statements.
All requested documents, including accident photos and official police report, were submitted by the claimant.
The investigation team began examining the details of the collision and verifying the submitted evidence.
The investigation concluded confirming the claimant was not at fault for the vehicle collision.
A settlement offer covering damages and repair costs was proposed to the customer for their damaged car.
The claimant expressed satisfaction with the timely investigation and the proposed settlement amount.
The claim was officially approved with full coverage based on the terms of the insurance policy.
The approved payment for the vehicle repairs was processed and issued to the claimant's designated account.
The insurance claim case was closed following successful payment and customer confirmation of repair completion.
The entire claim documentation and correspondence were archived for future reference and regulatory compliance.
